snippet: As football drives conference realignment, seven colleges that do not belong to the Football Bowl Subdivision may leave the Big East Conference to form their own league.
abstract: Big East's seven basketball-only universities, pending resolution of legal and semantic details, and barring any last-minute maneuvering by Big East commissioner Mike Aresco. are expected to split from rest of conference and form a league revolving around basketball.
lead_paragraph: As football drives conference realignment, seven colleges that do not belong to the Football Bowl Subdivision may leave the Big East Conference to form their own league.

headline.seo: Big East Likely to Lose 7 Colleges That Want to Focus on Basketball
headline.main: 7 Colleges Seem Ready to Bolt From Big East
headline.print_headline: 7 Colleges Seem Ready To Bolt From Big East
